hero.name: Alexander Shamshurin
hero.description: I'm a designer, developer, and entrepreneur. I specialize in creating digital products from concept to implementation.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I've been working in design and development for over 5 years. My experience includes working on various projects — from startups to large corporate solutions.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Let's discuss your next project. I'm always open to new challenges and interesting opportunities.
